description: The Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Low is up for the elements—all the elements. Surrounding a weather-resistant eVent™ bootie construction is everything you love about the classic Lone Peak plus the new addition of the responsive Altra EGO™ midsole. The MaxTrac™ outsole keeps you conquering rough terrain so you can enjoy high speeds with dry feet.
name: Altra Lone Peak AW Low - Mens
